name: Singed
subtitle: the Mad Chemist
description: Singed is a Zaunite alchemist of unmatched intellect, who has devoted his life to pushing the boundaries of knowledge—with no price, even his own sanity, too high to pay. Is there a method to his madness? His concoctions rarely fail, but it appears to... See More

abilities.name: Noxious Slipstream
abilities.description: Singed drafts off nearby champions, gaining a burst of Move Speed when passing them.

abilities.name: Poison Trail
abilities.description: Leaves a trail of poison behind Singed, dealing damage to enemies caught in the path.

abilities.name: Mega Adhesive
abilities.description: Throws a vial of mega adhesive on the ground, slowing and grounding enemies who walk on it.

abilities.name: Fling
abilities.description: Damages target enemy unit and flings them into the air behind Singed. If the target Singed flings lands in his Mega Adhesive, they are also rooted.
